description:
Experienced Professional Feat 1
GeneralSkill
Source Core Rulebook pg. 261
Prerequisites trained in Lore
You carefully safeguard your professional endeavors to prevent disaster. When you use Lore to Earn Income, if you roll a critical failure, you instead get a failure. If youâ€™re an expert in Lore, you gain twice as much income from a failed check to Earn Income, unless it was originally a critical failure.
